fields.summary: Out of order steps when restoring eucalyptus database

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I'm having issues with the eucalyptus db restore after fresh Centos install.  I've tried this after C6 and C7 installs and I am running into the same problem.  After installing Eucalyptus, I followed the steps on this page:

http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#admin-guide/restore_postgres.html

I get through all the steps but when trying to start eucalyptus-cloud, I receive errors in the cloud-error.log file and the cloud service does not start properly.  This was originally a ceph cloud but not sure that makes a difference or not.
{code}

fields.summary: Certificate not trusted error when trying to restore eucalyptus database after new OS install

comments.body: I would think step 6 should come before step 3 in the restore instructions.

This was also failing on 4.2 so I retried the same 4.2 cloud with the different sequence and it worked successfully.  I'm guessing the same thing will occur in 4.3 so I'm resolving this.  If I reproduce in 4.3 I will re-open this bug.
Filed DOC-1886 regarding the out of sequence issue.
